_comment: Organization migration rules for actions moving between GitHub organizations
_description: Use this when actions have moved from one organization to another, requiring both repository location changes and version updates.

migration_rules._comment: Example: Action moved from legacy-org to modern-org
migration_rules.recommendation: Action has been migrated to modern-org/recommended-action for better maintenance and enhanced features

migration_rules._comment: Example: Community action moved to official GitHub Actions org
migration_rules.recommendation: Community action officially adopted by GitHub Actions team with long-term support guarantees

migration_rules._comment: Example: Third-party action moved to new maintainer
migration_rules.recommendation: Action maintenance transferred to new-maintainer with continued development and security updates

version_rules._comment: Force migration from legacy-org actions (mark as deprecated)
version_rules.recommendation: ALL versions of legacy-org/deprecated-action are deprecated. Migrate to modern-org/recommended-action v2.0.0

version_rules._comment: Community action that moved to official organization
version_rules.recommendation: Community maintained action moved to official GitHub Actions organization for long-term support

_transformation_examples._comment: These transformations will be applied automatically during migration
